Ok.

Kyle, lets go back a bit. Cutie is on earth right now. The amoeba 
thingy definately won't work, so ditch it. To hopefully end 
discussion of this, Cutie is, by the IRON HAND of the council, now a 
translucent, transparent ghost on earth, awaiting a blank protoform 
to posses. He will start in mid Africa, and you can take if it from 
there. How Cutie finds a protoform is up to you, but make sure that 
it is reasonable. (if you are unsure, ASK!)

Read the following and comply:

NO MORE OOC POSTS. I'm going to ban the next person who makes a 
violation. (note: there are exceptions)

Try to refrain from posting more than 10 times a day, OMG is it 
frustrating to read through each post, especially when several of 
them are pushing our limits for moding.

EVERYONE IS REQUIRED TO READ ROLEPLAING 101A and 101B IN THE 
nbwrpg.com messageboard. NO BUTS. I'm tempted to create a quiz to 
make sure everyone has read it. I'm also tempted to create a quiz 
about the rules, cause they are important, and I don't feel like 
reciting them to each person who decides that they don't need to 
check them.

There is also going to be another vote on restart vs sequel. We urge 
people to really think about which would be BETTER FOR THE RPG. I 
think you'll find that a restart is a better choice.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> (OOC)
> 
> /rant mode on
> 
> To clear things up a bit before the kindegarden rejects get sent 
to the corner:
> 
> 1) a single celled anything would not have a pupose. To have 
purpose you have to be self aware which said organisms are not.
> 
> 2) No a single celled organism could not exist in space. While it 
doesn't need to breath it still needs to absorb material to survive. 
Space dust is not going to keep it alive...if the radiation in space 
doesn't kill it instantly.
> 
> 3) If you're going to have a "ghostly" entity floating about at 
least do some research on previous occurances. Starscream happens to 
be the prime example of this type of character. His spark for 
whatever reason did not join the matrix when his body got slagged on 
multiple occassions. His spark roamed space "possessing" bots. This 
is the closest sensible thing I could compare this cutie crap to.
> 
> 4) Last but certainly least can you guys ever just agree to 
disagree and let the council settle an arguement instead of 
squabbling like spoiled children? I know rauq and the others must be 
busy but getting 50 odd emails, 90% of which is a bitch fest back 
and forth is annoying.
